Name: Little Witchelsa: Pumpkin Peril
About the game: Witchelsa is on a quest to lift a curse placed on her father. Powerful magic is needed to break the curse and Marlow’s graveyard challenge may hold the key. By solving the graveyard’s puzzles, she will be granted one wish that she can use to break the curse and save her father. Join Witchella on her adventure and help solve match 3 and hidden object puzzles in a spooky graveyard! Earn gold coins and buy magical boosters An immersive hidden object experience Get a free spin for a chance to win bonuses Beautiful and spooky graphics.
